title: Panic Node
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
Geth
Version: 1.6.5-stable
Git Commit: cf87713dd42162861b7ed227f79f0638a33571df
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.8.3
Operating System: windows
GOPATH=
GOROOT=c:\go
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

The reported version is `1.6.5`, which is a couple of releases back. There has been work done on the trie and downloader since then. 

Please try a recent version (either head or `1.6.7`). I'll close this ticket, but if you get the same error with the new version, please open it again.
